abstract: Statements made by feminist icons Madeleine Albright and Gloria Steinem calling on younger women to support Hillary Clinton's presidential candidacy stir up generational clash as many young women supporters of Sen Bernie Sanders take offense; Steinem issues retraction of one of her more controversial statements in response to online backlash; dispute underscores Clinton's weak support among young Democratic women.

headline.print_headline: Female Icons Tell the Young to Get With It
headline.main: Gloria Steinem and Madeleine Albright Rebuke Young Women Backing Bernie Sanders

snippet: Ms. Steinem and Ms. Albright called on young women who favor Mr. Sanders over Hillary Clinton to essentially grow up and get with the program.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Steinem and Ms. Albright called on young women who favor Mr. Sanders over Hillary Clinton to essentially grow up and get with the program.
